Netherlands Xen Windows VPS
Setup Time : Instant

Netherlands 1Gbps Xen Windows VPS runs on XEN Virtualisation provided with SolusVM Control Panel gives the Windows VPS to perform at a high standards with more reliability and scalability. Windows VPS are completely managed from the client control panel with option from start, stop, reboot and reinstallation with various OS Variants to choose from, these can be access at any instance of time. Windows VPS are provided with full root access and with flexible option to upgrade the vps at any instance.

These VPS are performance of a Dedicated Servers but at cost effective price. Inetwebhost provides VPS services which are excellent to use ASP.net Applications, Remote Database, MS-SQL Servers, Metatrade MT4 which requires more resources and stable network. Inetwebhost provides 6 different configurations Plans.
Main Hardware Nodes are located at AMSTERDAM, NETHERLANDS, STORE DATA CENTER.
